name: Faded Recipe
flavorText: Manic scribbles and diagrams cover the page, showing how to combine three items into one.
flavorTextHtml: Manic scribbles and diagrams cover the page, showing how to combine three items into one.
description: A tedious recipe that has faded into the mists of time.
